title: Online Training Program for Enhancing Male Mental Health Counseling Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mental health counseling theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation training in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, focusing on practical competency development through learner interaction and real-time feedback

learning_goals: Understand gender socialization of male clients and apply it to counseling strategies
Assess depression and suicide risk in male clients and implement effective interventions
Practice and evaluate therapeutic relationship-building skills with male clients through VR simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
